CheckTitle: Always Use HTTPS is enabled to redirect all HTTP traffic
Description: Verifies that Always Use HTTPS is enabled to automatically redirect all HTTP requests to HTTPS, enforcing encrypted transport for all visitors.
Risk: Without automatic HTTPS redirects, users may access resources over unencrypted HTTP, exposing traffic to interception, modification, and man-in-the-middle attacks that compromise confidentiality and integrity.

Recommendation.Text: Enable Always Use HTTPS to enforce encrypted connections. Combine with HSTS to prevent SSL stripping attacks and ensure browsers always connect securely following defense in depth principles.
